'''Joss''' is a character in the [[Season 5|fifth season]]. He will be played by [[James McKenzie Robinson]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/game-thrones-update-season-5-cast-sets-newest-thrones-book-released/]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there are several characters named Joss. The only one who is a resident of [[Braavos]] is a mummer from "The Ship" playhouse.
